Sutherland is lighting up today with 5 ft @ 12s W swell and light 7 mph WSW winds. Melvich and Strathy are prime spots, offering clean conditions during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell holds at 5 ft @ 12s WNW with light 8 mph SSE winds, keeping the fun going at the same spots. On the day after, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 11s WNW with 7 mph S winds, still providing workable waves. Best: today.
